Posts.Content: Sep 30, 2017 09:53PM michelept wrote: the short answer is yes......the hardest part is dealing with drains......making sure you keep a log of how much fluid drains and draining it often. I didn't feel much pain....so, yes...you can very much care for yourself.
Posts.Title: Can I just take care of myself after double mastectomy? Kahnartist ksusan
